[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/module-minifier](./module-minifier.md) &gt; [IWorkerPoolMinifierOptions](./module-minifier.iworkerpoolminifieroptions.md) &gt; [terserOptions](./module-minifier.iworkerpoolminifieroptions.terseroptions.md)

## IWorkerPoolMinifierOptions.terserOptions property

The options to forward to Terser. `output.comments` is currently not configurable and will always extract license comments to a separate file.

**Signature:**

```typescript
terserOptions?: MinifyOptions;
```
